name: Leilei Relay
overview: Baby UFOs in UFOland have to train arduously before they can leave their homeworld. Historically, the most infamous of these training grounds was the Lei Lei Relay. Collect the lanterns to advance to the next field, up until you reach the UFO cathedral. There you will attain the title of UFO master. LeiLei Relay is a gravity thrust style of game which requires you to guide the UFO using only rotation and thrusters around the game room to collect all the lanterns before you can move onto the next level.
